content: Hi, I installed Zulip using the automated installer, but I want to change the nginx files to include the actual hostname, so I can host multiple subdomains on this box. Can I just change the nginx files or will Puppet override this?
Should I edit the Puppet files to reflect this? Or is there a directory where I can add a Hiera yaml file which overrides some settings?
never mind I figured it out, it was just in the settings.py
